item.description:
On Thursday, April 9th join us at the Rattlesnake Bar and Grill in Boston for free appetizers, sex trivia with prizes, giveaways and a cash bar.

Come network with supporters and test your sexual health knowledge! Suggested donation: $5.

Planned Parenthood League of Massachusetts (PPLM) is hosting this event to kick off our "Get Yourself Tested '09 Campaign" in April. Did you know that 1 out of 3 of people in the US contract an STD before age 25? Planned Parenthoods nationally have partnered with MTV, Seventeen Magazine and other health organizations to raise awareness about getting tested. Throughout the month of April PPLM is offering discounted, walk-in STD testing at all health center locations.

We hope you can join us for this exciting event at The Rattlesnake! Please RSVP by April 8th.

For more information call 617-284-8023 or e-mail public_info@pplm.org
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the top floor lounge.
item.name: Sex Trivia Anyone?
